subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The Crimson Tide stayed focused on Auburn and the Iron Bowl and bashed the defending national champion Tigers, 42-14, before looking ahead to a probable rematch with L.S.U.
snippet: The Crimson Tide stayed focused on Auburn and the Iron Bowl and bashed the defending national champion Tigers, 42-14, before looking ahead to a probable rematch with L.S.U.
